author: tchent (ttt)
content:
公司名稱，統編(中華民國以外註冊可免填):Robert Walters, 53546368
公司地址(填寫詳細至號): 台北市信義區松智路1號10樓

Position: Senior Java Engineer
Location: Neihu or Daan district


Main tasks include:
·         Work as part of an agile development team to write Java code for enterprise services
·         Design, in collaboration with team, the software implementations that satisfy business requirements
·         Design, in collaboration with the architecture team, the system architectures that satisfy business requirements
·         Develop deployment systems for Java based systems
·         Monitor and support operation of production systems

Main requirements include:
·         Minimum 3-4 years of Java developer experience, must have Spring MVC/ Hibernate experience
·         Experience with agile development methodologies
·         Experience with continuous integration systems
·         Experience with service oriented architecture including REST, JSON
·         Experience with multi-threaded programming

Salary: 1.2-1.6M, depending on related experience

員工是否需自備工具? (是/否) :否
加班費制度: 比照勞基法


人資或徵才聯絡方式: Ruby Lin of Robert Walters, a global headhunting company.
Dir: +886 2 8758 0706
E-mail: 

Web: www.robertwalters.com.tw

Also welcome to refer any of your friends who might be interested in this role. We will provide NTD10,000 referral fee for each successful placement.  : )


--
※ 發信站: 批踢踢實業坊(ptt.cc), 來自: 27.246.4.248

title: [徵才] Robert Walters代徵Senior Java Engineer
